entry.title: Simple Bitcoin Payment Channel Protocol v0.1 draft (request for comments)
entry.summary: Rune Kj√¶r Svendsen shared on bitcoin-dev about developing a protocol for payment channels that aims to standardize the operations of opening, paying and closing. The author has written up a specification of how it operates. In the past, refund Bitcoin transactions depended on another unconfirmed Bitcoin transaction, making the setup of payment channels risky. However, CHECKLOCKTIMEVERIFY now allows payment channel setup to be risk-free. Rusty encourages people to take advantage of this feature, especially with Segregated Witness expected soon.
